entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bella Bella
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:48 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Bella Airport 12:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 6.4°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 6.1°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Wind light except northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:30 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind light except northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:30 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 50 gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
